title: Microsoft may finally get rid of useless AI features in Windows 11 following user backlash
description: A new report brings great news for many Windows 11 customers, as Redmond is seemingly considering removing and streamlining many AI features (bloat?) in the OS. Read more...

title: Pentagon and Anthropic clash over lethal AI limits
description: Pentagon negotiations with Anthropic have stalled amid a dispute over restrictions the company has embedded to prevent autonomous targeting and domestic surveillance, throwing uncertainty over a proposed defence AI contract valued at about $200 million and sharpening fault lines in Washington’s approach to military automation. Senior defence officials have pressed Anthropic to relax safeguards that block its models from selecting or engaging targets without human authorisation and [...]The article Pentagon and Anthropic clash over lethal AI limits appeared first on Arabian Post.

title: AI tool predicts six-month risks for cancer patients after heart attack
description: Cancer patients who suffer a heart attack face a dangerous mix of risks, which makes their clinical treatment particularly challenging. As a result, patients with cancer have been systematically excluded from many clinical trials and available risk scores. Until now, doctors had no standard tool to guide treatment in this vulnerable group.

title: Broadcom's AI Success Is Undeniable - The Investment Case Is Not
description: Broadcom posted strong results and a $73B AI backlog, but a 70x valuation raises deceleration risk. Click here to read my most recent analysis of AVGO.
